body:
https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/7601 broke `boost` on `Ubuntu` with `gcc` 7 and 6.

### Expected Result

`boost` installs.

### Actual Result

```
error: "default" is not a known value of feature <cxxstd>
error: legal values: "98" "03" "0x" "11" "1y" "14" "1z" "17" "2a" "latest"
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install boost
```

### Information on your system

Ubuntu18.04 gcc7.3.0
title: boost is broken on gcc 7 and 6 with Ubuntu
